message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront since the inflation hits me harder.
Your share is impacted by inflation more, let's be practical. This offer is fair considering the circumstances.
Bob, my offer is still the same.  We are running out of time, and this is the best deal you will get.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. This is a fair 50/50 split.  The longer we wait, the less we both get.
